title: Flase reporting
body: People are getting banned because of people like this. Something needs to happen with this false reports [](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/617695463860338691/630922588834496542/Untitled.png)

replies.body:
false or invalid reports are not counted

and that is a dead link

Lol do you not understand the system It is legit counted if people report you its a bot. No rioter looks at reports. The only way to get a report not counted is to open a ticket. But before that it is counted

> [{quoted}](name=GodzBlindZpot,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IPklu7MM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-08T00:26:41.571+0000)
>
> Lol do you not understand the system 

might want to look in the mirror on that one...
The point I'm trying to make is I should have to go out of my way to take off a false claim. 90% of the claims you try to make are copy pasted they don't care.

false claims are not counted...

if you were punished, feel free to post your complete, unedited logs and we will help you identify why

How is something reviewed when within 5 seconds of report I am chat banned? That is not getting reviewed that is a bot automatically banning you if your teamates report you...

If you get banned within 5 seconds of the report that is a bot automatically banning you and then they don't review it after. Its a pre written bot message that is sent to you

Half correct.  A bot REVIEWED your chat log and same bot chat restricted you.  Computer nowadays can process pure text in less than a micro-second.  You are punished because you were toxic in chat.  Feel free to post your unedited, complete chat logs of all games shown on that report to prove it.
So in other words if just one "bad word" is said the bot will ban you thats unreliable. How is that a reliable way to ban people, you can take words out of context by using that
Where in my reply did I even hinted or implied at that?

Yes "pure text in less than a second"

that means that it has a set amount of words in its programming to ban if seen...

Reviewing a chat is not the same as scanning a chat. 

While there is a part of the system that does scan for specific prohibited words, another part of the system is able to read the tone of your chat. If you used chat in an insulting / harassment manner, the system will ding you. 

Get dinged often enough, you'll get punished.
Then how come I got banned after one ding?

Keep in mind this reply is based on the fact that we can't see that image you posted.

Assuming you didn't use any Zero Tolerance phrases, the reform card only shows you 1-5 recent games as examples of unacceptable behavior,  doesn't mean you were punished for 1 game alone. 

You can submit a ticket to Riot Support and ask how many games were considered in your punishment, and they'll be able to tell you how many times you were recently reported.

i've yet to see a chatlog of some sort proving your innocence despite numerous requests for it.

all i'm seeing are excuses you came up with on the fly on why you're right and the bot is wrong

i said "process" pure text.  When you are being reviewed for chat offenses, only your chat log (i.e. "pure text" explicitly meaning no pictures, no game play data, no voice, no mouse click, no connection status, etc. etc.  nothing but text) is being reviewed, or processed.  I did not imply anything about one "bad word" (although as Kei143 said, 1 part of the IFS is zero tolerance filter).  Processing (is not same thing as filtering) about 50 lines of pure text with whatever machine learning algorithm the IFS uses does not take 5 seconds with the computing power in today world.

It is not a binary system. Your toxicity is measured on a scale. You have to be above the minimum for the report to be valid.

Your total “toxicity score” is what gets you punished - whether it’s met in one single game or over 5+ games.

> How is something reviewed when within 5 seconds of report I am chat banned? 

Do you know how computers work? I mean, do you understand that computers are "fast"?

A report just means a review. 

A review can lead to the system concluding there is no toxicity, so it won't count towards a punishment.

Doesn't matter if the review was done by a human or a bot.

It wasn't reviewed by anyone it was just a bot that auto banned me. No one looked at it you have to open your own ticket in order to get it reviewed. Which means I have to log into the browser open a ticket and send screen shots. Which should be done by the people who get paid to do this. no?

AI nowadays are pretty smart. They are able to understand the full context of conversations and whether the text was used in a insulting / harassment manner within microseconds. 

Don't believe me? Go check out those ads for Grammarly.

> [{quoted}](name=GodzBlindZpot,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IPklu7MM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-08T00:26:41.571+0000)
>
> Lol do you not understand the system It is legit counted if people report you its a bot. No rioter looks at reports. The only way to get a report not counted is to open a ticket. But before that it is counted

Reporting Guidelines
Pro tips:

    Make sure your report is tailored for the behavior you saw. It may be tempting to select every report category available but this is unnecessary. It only takes one report to trigger a review by our system selecting more than one category will do nothing to make your report more valuable.

    When possible, leave a concise and clear comment about the behavior you observed. For example, if the player decided to throw the game by rushing down middle lane after their first death a good comment would be: “Died at 5 minutes to a gank and then proceeded to run down mid for the rest of the match”. 

Things to avoid

    Do not threaten or repeatedly tell a player you will report them. Doing so can encourage players who are already negative to continue their behavior. Whether they know they are being reported or not has no bearing to whether the system will act on them. But most importantly, repeatedly threatening or arguing with a negative player can end up derailing the game for everyone else and then open yourself up to reports and possible disciplinary action as well. Avoid negative thoughts and useless chatting with poor performing teammates! Focus on victory by muting the offending player and then reporting them at the end of the game.

    Do not ask other players in the match to report the offending player. It only takes one report for our systems to review a game. Additional reports will not do anything for the offending player; however as mentioned above, it could open yourself up to a report of your own; especially if you are derailing the match by constantly demanding reports of other players.

    Negative behavior is unacceptable regardless of the circumstances or who started it. It can be tempting to respond to negative players with negativity of your own. Our systems do not care who started the behavior and will treat each reported player based off the merits of their own case. The only way to handle these types of players is to mute them and continue playing the game followed by giving them a report at the end of the match.

source: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player

What even _is_ literacy?

False reports do absolutely nothing. Reports do nothing except trigger a review of the game. Number of reports has no impact on the results.
Why are all my comments being down voted I am not saying anything false?

Because you are arguing with everyone and refusing to accept multiple explanations regarding how the system functions.

Downvote doesn't mean people think you're lying, downvote means people don't agree with you.
The system is flawed thats all im trying to say i understand the system that isnt the argument. It is a flawed system you dont have humans looking at the report and just rely on a bot
You want biased, lazy humans to judge your reports? Because I sure don't.

> [{quoted}](name=GodzBlindZpot,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IPklu7MM,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-10-08T01:32:14.209+0000)
>
> The system is flawed thats all im trying to say i understand the system that isnt the argument. It is a flawed system you dont have humans looking at the report and just rely on a bot

If you want a human to review your logs at Riot, you'll have to submit a [Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com).

You cannot be punished for actions you don't commit (or, false reports); you're only held responsible for your actions/behavior.
Your comments are being downvoted, because the notorious "Riot defender" gang is grouping up on you. They claim it's not toxic behaviour. LMAO
wow...just wow...{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
What do you guys not get no one shamed this guy all we did was tell him to chill out? How is the world is that reportable??? Oh also because they were friends he reported....
Please feel free to post your chat logs to prove your innocence.
How do i get chat logs?

If you were punished they show up when you log in.

If you weren’t punished, then obviously the report hasn’t counted towards a punishment yet. If it was counted, then I encourage you to review the summoners code because you did something wrong.
It does not give you all the chat logs of what people were saying

It does not matter what others are saying.

Seriously. Go reread the summoners code. Nowhere in it does it say “if someone else says/does something first it’s okay”.
There’s no risk to your body or property in League. That’s a requirement for self defense in law.

If someone throws a jab (aka toxic/ rude/ lie comment at me) I refuse just to lay down and accept that. It's just self defense human instinct. Muting people right away is the easy way out and not giving that person a freedom of speech to explain themselves or myself. no?
do yourself a favor and dont bring up freedom of speech, you'll just look foolish
Sounds like someone wants to live in China! China number 1 lolololololol

Freedom of Speech only protects you from the government settings rules against speech (some exception like in cases just to cause panic). Freedom of speech has no bearing in a private company. If a business decided you couldn't say purple in their establishment; they would tell you to leave if you broke that rule.

Second, defending yourself if muting (blocking) to protect yourself. Striking back is called retaliation.
lolwut?{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Chatlog, please. Otherwise we can't really give you an opinion.

1.) Link is broken.

2.) Naming and shaming is against the board's rules.

3.) Invalid reports do not result in punishment. If you got punished, you broke the rules.
4) if you want people to agree with you, post your chatlogs and prove you were innocent.
I got ban for inting in normals tell what kind of ban system they have like please riot fix this this is not fear there was nutalis on my game feeding to why getingme ban not him
lolwut?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
